flows.name: PingOne Neo Starter Flow - Verifiable Credential Presentation Request

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

customHTML.value:
{{title}}

{{subtitle}}

Credential Information
Type: {{type}}
Status: {{verificationStatus}}
Issuer: {{issuerName}}

Claims
{{#each data}}
{{@key}}: {{this}}
{{/each}}
{{/each}}

sktemplate.name: VerifyPolling

annotation.value: Primary Flow:  Initiate a VC Presentation Request for Credential Validation

customHTML.value:
{{title}}

{{description}}

{{title}}

{{subtitle}}

{{#each verificationData/credentialsDataList}}

Failure Details

sktemplate.name: VerifyPolling

annotation.value: To Configure: Define the requested credential type in the 'Presentation Request Settings' node.  The credential type is typically the credential name, e.g. VerifiedEmployee.

fields.displayName: Request message to display on the credential wallet, if supported.
Optional. If not defined, all keys are returned.  Comma-delimited list of requested credential keys if specific keys from the credential are desired.
Type of credential to verify. Must be the name of a PingOne credential type issued by the credential issuer.

presentationMessage.description: Message to display on the wallet during the presentation request.
presentationMessage.name: presentationMessage

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

annotation.value: Poll Session Status and Return Verification Result
Primary Flow:  Initiate a VC Presentation Request for Credential Validation

sktemplate.name: VerifyPolling

annotation.value: Flow continues (any trigger completes) if unable to detect device type.
Mobile UX cannot use QR code. Same-device, mobile pattern is not implemented.

customHTML.value:
{{title}}

{{subtitle}}

sktemplate.name: VerifyPolling

annotation.value: Subflow Input Schema: presentationMessage, credentialType, credentialKeys

Note: For security reasons, the presentation request defaults to accept credentials from current environment only.  Modify the 'Create Presentation Session Request' node to change the environment restriction requirements.

inputSchema.description: Message to display on the wallet during the presentation request.
